channel.title: Comments on: What does the lock icon mean in SSMS when looking at a stored procedure?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Keith Mescha
item.dc:creator: Keith Mescha
item.content:encoded:
I actually ran into this today as well. I saw the lock and figured out after some research that these procs were part of a Service Broker Queue Activation. Would this fall under the CLR pieces you described above?

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms190495(v=SQL.90).aspx

item.title: By: Picatrix
item.dc:creator: Picatrix
item.description: Interesting, I did not know this..thanks
